#summary Install jCSV

= Install jCSV =

All you need to do is to include the latest version of jCSV to you classpath. 
The latest stable version is 1.0.1 and can be downloaded in the [http://code.google.com/p/jcsv/downloads/list download area]

If you want to use some of the new features, you can use the SNAPSHOT version. It will do its work, but the API may change until it becomes stable.
Download: [http://jcsv.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/target/jcsv-1.0.2-SNAPSHOT.jar 1.0.2-SNAPSHOT.jar] 

=== Maven Repository ===
jCSV will be available in the maven repos :)
